translation.en: Then the next big thing, obviously, is the dollar amount.

translation.en: Any type of a kidnapper is gonna want a million bucks or 100,000 or a quarter- million.

translation.en: They don't list $118,000 specifically.

translation.ja: 休暇を楽しんでくれ

translation.en: The JonBenet Ramsey case is a case like we have never seen before,
translation.ja: ジョンベネ殺害事件は かつてないケースで

translation.en: a case like I don't think any of you have ever seen before.
translation.ja: 史上 稀(まれ)に見る凶悪事件です

translation.en: There have been many stories and much speculation about who killed JonBenet.
translation.ja: 殺害犯について さまざまな臆測がありますが

translation.en: Prejudging and media hype have never solved a crime.
translation.ja: 事件解決には 何ら結びつきません

translation.en: The reality of the situation is that often these types of investigations take time.
translation.ja: こうした凶悪事件の捜査には 時間がかかるものです

translation.en: Are the Ramseys still the focus of this investigation or have they been elevated to the status of suspects?
translation.ja: ラムジー夫妻は容疑者として 捜査の対象になっていますか

translation.en: No comment. No more questions.
translation.ja: 何もお答えできません

translation.en: Was Patsy involved?
translation.ja: パッツィーの関与は？

translation.en: This is Patsy writing? Okay.
translation.ja: パッツィーの手記ね

translation.en: Let me just read it real quick. The pink cowboy sweetheart costume.
translation.ja: “カウボーイの 恋人になりたいの”

translation.en: The pink cowboy sweetheart costume was made out of some polyester fabric I bought in Atlanta.
translation.ja: “あの曲を歌った時の衣装は 私が生地から選んで作り”

translation.en: I doctored up the white cowgirl hat and boots. It was precious.
translation.ja: “帽子とブーツも合わせた 最高の衣装よ”

translation.en: It was precious.
translation.ja: “最高の衣装よ”

translation.en: That summer, JonBenet went prepared. I could give her that.
translation.ja: “あの夏 ジョンベネは 準備万端だった”

translation.en: I couldn't give her the stage presence that God gave her. That was a gift.
translation.ja: “でも神が与えし舞台に 立たせてやれなかった”

translation.en: JonBenet was looking forward to the day she could wear real evening gowns,
translation.ja: “本物のイブニングドレスを 着させてやりたかった”

translation.en: just like her mother.
translation.ja: “母親のように”

translation.en: Just like her mother.
translation.ja: “母親のように”

translation.en: It is so narcissistic. I'm just shocked.
translation.ja: なんてナルシストな 母親かしら

translation.en: I don't remember that. I read this book, and I don't remember it.
translation.ja: 以前も読んだけど これは覚えてない

translation.en: She was no longer doing the beauty queen thing. She'd gotten too old.
translation.ja: 年をとったパッツィーは コンテスト出場をあきらめ

translation.en: And so this was her opportunity to live it again through her daughter.
translation.ja: 自分の娘に 希望を託したんだと思います

translation.en: The little girl really loved it. From what we can tell, she loved it.
translation.ja: 映像を見るかぎり ジョンベネは喜んでたと思う

translation.en: She was not forced into it. It was not, You have to go do this.
translation.ja: 映像を見るかぎり ジョンベネは喜んでたと思う コンテストに出るのが 大好きだったはずよ

translation.en: She really loved it.
translation.ja: コンテストに出るのが 大好きだったはずよ

translation.en: So it kind of feels like a... a legacy thing for Patsy, actually.
translation.ja: 娘が自分に似たことを パッツィーは確信したのね

translation.en: I know a lot of people think that's weird, to have a little girl dressed up where she looks like a 20- year- old woman.
translation.ja: 少女が大人の女性みたいに めかし込んだ姿は奇妙だけど

translation.en: But that's the pageant system.
translation.ja: それがコンテストなのよ

translation.en: And a lot of those girls go on to do great things... or work at Hooters.
translation.ja: みんな きっと大物になる もしくはウエートレスかしら

translation.en: From what...
translation.ja: 実はですね

translation.en: I heard and kind of put together...
translation.ja: いろんな話を聞いてきました

translation.en: it sounded like... that family was really screwed up.
translation.ja: それを総合すると 一家は崩壊してたようです

translation.en: Patsy was at least involved. I'm not sure if she did it.
translation.ja: パッツィーは 事件に関与してたと思います

translation.en: I hope she didn't, but I think she might have.
translation.ja: 犯人じゃないことを願うけど 真相はどうかしら

translation.en: She just made me angry. Watching her...
translation.ja: パッツィーには 激しい怒りを覚えるの

translation.en: Listening to her and then her husband...
translation.ja: 言うことなすこと頭にくる それと夫のほうは…

translation.en: I think he's the innocent one.
translation.ja: ジョンは無実だと思う

translation.en: I don't believe he was involved in any way.
translation.ja: 事件には関与してないよ

translation.en: I just think he's innocent.
translation.ja: 私は彼が無実だと思ってる

translation.en: The more manic side of this whole situation seemed to come from Patsy's side.
translation.ja: 感情の起伏が激しいのは パッツィーだと思う

translation.en: She seems more inclined to be the one that might have struck someone in anger than John does.
translation.ja: カッとして子供をたたくのは ジョンより彼女じゃないかな

translation.en: More than anything, I think it was the ransom note that was written,
translation.ja: 決定的な証拠は 手書きの脅迫状だと思います

translation.en: that handwriting experts said she most likely wrote.
translation.ja: 筆跡鑑定のプロが パッツィーを疑っている

translation.en: I found that pretty interesting because I've had my handwriting analyzed.
translation.ja: 実は私も筆跡鑑定を 受けたことがあるのですが

translation.en: And it was fascinating, because I wasn't there.
translation.ja: あの時は本当に驚きました 私の知らないうちに 元カレが鑑定を依頼してたの

translation.en: It was an ex- boyfriend who showed this handwriting expert...
translation.ja: 私の知らないうちに 元カレが鑑定を依頼してたの

translation.en: a birthday card that I gave him.
translation.ja: 私が贈った誕生日カードでね

translation.en: But this expert could actually tell that I had had a trauma to my right ankle.
translation.ja: すると鑑定士は 私が足首に 不安を抱えていると見抜いた

translation.en: And sure enough, I had reconstructive surgery on my right ankle.
translation.ja: 確かに私は 右足首を手術しています

translation.en: Why would-- She has no motive.
translation.ja: パッツィーに動機などない

translation.en: I'm frustrated as a parent. I'm frustrated with my kids.
translation.ja: 私も自分の子供に イラつくことはあるけど

translation.en: There's no motive to kill them. There's no motive to do that.
translation.ja: 私も自分の子供に イラつくことはあるけど 殺したりしない

translation.en: I could see the jealousy aspect. Since Patsy Ramsey was a beauty pageant queen herself,
translation.ja: パッツィーはジョンベネに 嫉妬してたんじゃないかしら

translation.en: maybe her daughter was having a little bit more success or wasn't listening to her.
translation.ja: 自分より成功してる娘が 許せなかったのかも

translation.en: You know, I don't know if Patsy Ramsey's background was any mental illness or anything like that,
translation.ja: パッツィーの精神状態が どうだったかは知らないが

translation.en: but of course we know she died of cancer.
translation.ja: ガンで亡くなったのは事実だ

translation.en: And sometimes, when there's disease, there's dis- ease.
translation.ja: 人は病気をすると 精神もやられてしまうもんだ

translation.en: And then we heard about the bed- wetting, and the general discord in the family,
translation.ja: ジョンベネのおねしょ癖や 一家に亀裂があったと聞くと

translation.en: and we were... That's why everybody was thinking it had to be in the family.
translation.ja: 家族を疑いたくなるのは 当然じゃないかしら

translation.en: You know, JonBenet Ramsey was a bed- wetter,
translation.ja: ジョンベネが おねしょをするたび

translation.en: and I know that there had been people interviewed that said that that had infuriated Patsy Ramsey.
translation.ja: パッツィーはひどい剣幕で まくしたてていたそうです

translation.en: And she wet her bed, actually, that night.
translation.ja: 事件のあった晩も同じでした

translation.en: There was one article I remember reading just recently,
translation.ja: 最近 読んだ記事によると

translation.en: and it identified Patsy as the lead suspect,
translation.ja: 当時パッツィーには 疑惑の目が向けられてた

translation.en: and went so far as to say she murdered her daughter.
translation.ja: 犯人と思われてたんです

translation.en: And what it cited that incited so much rage in me
translation.ja: 本当に腹立たしいことだけど その記事には—

translation.en: was that the stressors that Patsy was under...
translation.ja: 本当に腹立たしいことだけど その記事には— パッツィーがストレスを 抱えてたと書いてありました

translation.en: one of them being the holidays,
translation.ja: パッツィーがストレスを 抱えてたと書いてありました

translation.en: and another one being her impending 40th birthday.
translation.ja: 40歳を目前にして 焦りを感じていたのだと

translation.en: And I'll be 39 next month,
translation.ja: じきに私も39歳になります

translation.en: and if someone said
translation.ja: じきに私も39歳になります 40歳を前にして焦りを感じ 精神のバランスを崩したり

translation.en: that my impending 40th birthday caused me so much psychic strain
translation.ja: 40歳を前にして焦りを感じ 精神のバランスを崩したり

translation.en: that I would consider killing my child... I don't know what shade of ballistic I would go on them,
translation.ja: 子供を殺すかと聞かれたら ブチ切れると思います

translation.en: because talk about putting women in a box.
translation.ja: 女性をバカにしすぎてる

translation.en: I mean, the mother had to do it.
translation.ja: 犯人は母親だと思う

translation.en: She was about to turn 40. She's jealous. Her little girl was frustrating. She wet the bed.
translation.ja: 年をとった母親は娘に嫉妬し イライラしてた

translation.en: Maybe it was an accident. She threw her against the tub... and then covered it up.
translation.ja: あの晩 母親は娘を 思いきり突き飛ばしたのかも

translation.en: You know, people are quick to judge.
translation.ja: もちろん臆測にすぎませんが

translation.en: They talk about how they were so upset and all the pain,
translation.ja: 一家は苦しみ 傷ついてると言うけど

translation.en: but, like, you don't see any of it in their face, at all.
translation.ja: どう見ても 傷ついてるようには見えない

translation.en: You know, I don't know why no tears fell. I think... was she detached? Did she ever really love her little girl?
translation.ja: 確かに涙を流してたけど 心から娘を愛してたのかしら

translation.en: You don't know how you're gonna react.
translation.ja: 遺族の反応はさまざまよ

translation.en: My personal reaction was quite violent. I screamed. I cried.
translation.ja: 私の場合はかなり激しくて 泣いたり わめいたりした

translation.en: My parents told me in the back of a car, and I remember just screaming,
translation.ja: 車の後部座席に突っ伏して “誰が殺したの？”と 泣き叫んでた

translation.en: Who killed my brother? Who killed my brother?
translation.ja: “誰が殺したの？”と 泣き叫んでた

translation.en: At that point in time, we didn't even know he was murdered. We just knew he was dead.
translation.ja: その時点では まだ殺人と知らずにいたけど

translation.en: But I had this just overwhelming impression
translation.ja: 胸騒ぎというか 強烈な予感がしていたの

translation.en: that it was not a natural death, and it was not an accident.
translation.ja: ただの事故じゃないとね

translation.en: I was screaming so loud that people actually came out of the building to see what was going on.
translation.ja: 私の叫び声に驚いて 近所の人が集まってきた

translation.en: So that was my reaction.
translation.ja: それが私の反応でした

translation.en: I watched my parents. It was far more subtle and private.
translation.ja: でも両親は違いました じっと耐えていた

translation.en: Push your chair in a little bit, Gary.
translation.ja: もう少しイスを引いて

translation.en: Is Gary John? Okay.
translation.ja: 彼はジョン役ね？

translation.en: - Hi, John. - Patsy.
translation.ja: よろしく こちらこそ

translation.en: - Hi, nice to see you. - Hi. J. Michael Sterling.
translation.ja: よろしく どうも

translation.en: - Nice to meet you. - Nice to meet you.
translation.ja: がんばろう

translation.en: - It is like, us against the world. - It is, yeah. Absolutely.
translation.ja: 敵だらけだ そうね そのとおりよ

translation.en: I mean, they're both raw. Still. I mean, it's still so new.
translation.ja: ラムジー夫妻は まだ会見慣れしてなかった

translation.en: If I was being interviewed with my wife about something like that,
translation.ja: もし私が妻と一緒に 会見に臨むとしたら

translation.en: I'd have my arm around her. I'd be holding her hand. I'd be consoling her.
translation.ja: 妻の肩を抱いたり 手を握ったりすると思う

translation.en: I don't recall seeing them do that.
translation.ja: でもラムジー夫妻は違った

translation.en: You know, they were never really too close. Like, they weren't like this, or...
translation.ja: 彼らは近寄ったり 目を合わせることはなかった

translation.en: I mean, but I might just angle in.
translation.ja: 私だったら彼女に 体を向けてたかもしれない

translation.en: I don't think I would angle in.
translation.ja: 私なら前を向いてる

translation.en: There's a separation, and even sitting here setting up for the scene,
translation.ja: こうして座ってるだけでも 体が近づくのに

translation.en: it's like we would naturally be sitting closer.
translation.ja: 彼らは違った だから僕はあいさつだけして あとは黙ってた

translation.en: I did not... I mean, I said hello and then I tried to not make eye contact with you
translation.ja: だから僕はあいさつだけして あとは黙ってた

translation.en: 'cause I wanted to keep no conversation.
translation.ja: 会話もしないほうがいいと 思ったしね

translation.en: - Exactly. Like, We have a job to do. - Right.
translation.ja: 他人行儀だった

translation.en: Although we're friends on Facebook or something, right?
translation.ja: 例えるならＳＮＳの友達だよ

translation.en: - I was like, Oh, my God! - I know!
translation.ja: “はじめまして”って感じ

translation.en: - I've never met you. Cool. - We finally meet in person!
translation.ja: 初対面みたいだった

translation.en: To those of you who may want to ask, let me address very directly.
translation.ja: これだけは はっきり申し上げておきます

translation.en: I did not kill my daughter JonBenet.
translation.ja: 私は娘を殺していません

translation.en: There have also been innuendos that she has been or was...
translation.ja: “娘は性的な虐待を 受けていた”

translation.en: sexually molested.
translation.ja: そんな中傷もあります

translation.en: Those were the most hurtful innuendos to us as a family.
translation.ja: 私たち家族はそうした中傷に ひどく傷ついています

translation.en: I can tell you those were the most hurtful innuendos to us as a family.
translation.ja: 私たち家族は ひどく傷ついているのです

translation.en: They are totally false.
translation.ja: すべて事実無根です

translation.en: I'm appalled either John or I could have been involved in such a hideous, heinous crime.
translation.ja: こんな卑劣で凶悪な事件には 私たちは関わっていません

translation.en: But let me assure you that I did not kill JonBenet.
translation.ja: はっきりと否定します 私は娘を殺していません

translation.en: I did not have anything to do with it.
translation.ja: 私は事件に関わっていません

translation.en: I loved that child with my whole heart and soul.
translation.ja: 心から あの子を 愛していたのですから

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: How do you go on camera and say these lines,
translation.ja: カメラに向かって こんなセリフを言える？

translation.en: and make them look real?
translation.ja: つらすぎる

translation.en: The funny thing is, when you watch them talking about this it works either way.
translation.ja: 何が本当か分からなくなる

translation.en: It does. It does!
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: - You can say, Okay, they're lying. - Yeah.
translation.ja: ウソをついてるようにも 聞こえるし

translation.en: - They're telling the truth. - Look at the body language. Yeah.
translation.ja: 真実にも聞こえる ボディー･ランゲージを見て 不思議だよね

translation.en: I mean, it's just hard to say.
translation.ja: こう言っては悪いけど

translation.en: It just... it's hard to say.
translation.ja: こう言っては悪いけど ラムジー夫妻の会見は すごく奇妙だった

translation.en: I mean, a lot of their behavior was odd.
translation.ja: ラムジー夫妻の会見は すごく奇妙だった

translation.en: So you're saying that you think she did it?
translation.ja: パッツィーの犯行だと 思ってるでしょ？

translation.en: I think John didn't do it.
translation.ja: ジョンではないと思う

translation.en: You think John didn't do it? Interesting.
translation.ja: “ジョンではない” なるほどね

translation.en: It's like she was more concerned for who she was protecting.
translation.ja: パッツィーは誰かを かばっていたんだと思う

translation.en: I believe she was protecting someone in the family.
translation.ja: それは おそらく 家族の誰かじゃないかしら

translation.en: I'm not gonna state who because I really don't know which person that may have been,
translation.ja: 確信もないのに 誰とは言えないけど

translation.en: but I believe it was someone that they both loved very much.
translation.ja: 夫妻が愛してやまない誰かよ

translation.en: My name is Ryan, and I'm auditioning for the role of Burke.
translation.ja: 僕はライアン バーク役のオーディションだ

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: やあ！

translation.en: I'm Jase. I'm...
translation.ja: 僕の名前はジェイス

translation.en: I'm ten years old.
translation.ja: 今 10歳なんだ

translation.en: I live in Colorado.
translation.ja: コロラドに住んでる

translation.en: Littleton...
translation.ja: リトルトンってとこ

translation.en: Yeah, Littleton.
translation.ja: そう リトルトン

translation.en: So I've been in this one commercial that... I forgot what it was.
translation.ja: １回だけＣＭに 出たことがある

translation.en: It didn't play here,
translation.ja: でもここで放送されなかった

translation.en: but I was just an extra in it.
translation.ja: ただのエキストラだった

translation.en: I was one of the flying monkeys,
translation.ja: フライングモンキーの役を やったことがある

translation.en: one of the Oz- ians, one of the tough guy munchkins...
translation.ja: 「オズの魔法使い」の 強いマンチキンなんだ

translation.en: ...and then I also did a Denver mattress commercial,
translation.ja: デンバーマットレスの ＣＭに出たよ

translation.en: where all I did was wait for nine hours for the whole day. Skipped school just because of that
translation.ja: 撮影の日は学校を休んだ 出番まで９時間も待たされた

translation.en: and then I got to jump on the bed for nine minutes. That's all I did.
translation.ja: でも本番は たった９分で終わっちゃった

translation.en: All the other things I tried to do, I didn't get the part.
translation.ja: ほかにも受けたけど 役はもらえなかった

translation.en: My house has a pool in the backyard.
translation.ja: 僕の家にはプールがあるんだ

translation.en: If something happened... and I do know that the son, the brother of JonBenet,
translation.ja: ラムジー家の息子であり ジョンベネの兄のバークは

translation.en: did actually hit his sister with either a golf club or a baseball bat
translation.ja: 事件の２か月前 ジョンベネを殴ったらしい

translation.en: a month or two before this incident took place.
translation.ja: ゴルフクラブかバットでね

translation.en: But to me, that was, you know, a brother and sister...
translation.ja: でも それは よくある兄妹(きょうだい)ゲンカで 悪意はなかったと思う

translation.en: just having an argument, type of thing.
translation.ja: よくある兄妹(きょうだい)ゲンカで 悪意はなかったと思う

translation.en: But whoever struck that girl was so angry and so livid and so mad at her,
translation.ja: その一方で ジョンベネを 死に至らしめた犯人は

translation.en: with either the flashlight or a baseball bat,
translation.ja: 相当 怒ってたに違いない

translation.en: the skull fracture was intense. It was a mortal wound, from everything that I've seen,
translation.ja: 頭蓋骨(ずがいこつ)が骨折するほど 強い力で殴っている

translation.en: but what really finished her off was the strangulation.
translation.ja: 直接の死因は 絞殺らしいけどね

translation.en: I mean, at one point, me and my friends had read a book
translation.ja: 実は自殺マニュアルを 読んだことがあるんです

translation.en: about people hanging, you know.
translation.ja: 実は自殺マニュアルを 読んだことがあるんです そこで私は友人と台を作り 興味本位で自殺を試みました

translation.en: And so we built this little platform thing
translation.ja: そこで私は友人と台を作り 興味本位で自殺を試みました

translation.en: and hung each other, like on- stage, kind of thing.
translation.ja: そこで私は友人と台を作り 興味本位で自殺を試みました もちろん本気じゃなかったし みんな無事でしたよ

translation.en: It was just fooling around, and we didn't get hurt. We were fine. Nobody really got hung.
translation.ja: もちろん本気じゃなかったし みんな無事でしたよ

translation.en: But as an adult, think of walking into that situation.
translation.ja: 大人だから 無事で済んだんです

translation.en: Here are these four kids, they're all ten years old, something like that, hanging each other in the garage.
translation.ja: ですが もし幼い子供が 車庫で首をつろうとしたら？

translation.en: How stupid can you be? But we were kids. So could it happen? Yeah.
translation.ja: ありえないと思いますが 子供なら やりかねません

translation.en: I have two sisters and one brother. I'm the oldest.
translation.ja: 妹が２人に弟が１人いる 僕が長男なんだ

translation.en: I just have one sister.
translation.ja: 妹が１人いるよ

translation.en: Sometimes she'll take, like-- I have trading cards of Peyton Manning.
translation.ja: 僕はマニング選手の カードを集めてるんだけど

translation.en: She'll give them to my little brother, and I'll be like, Gabby, what the heck?
translation.ja: たまに妹が横取りして 大ゲンカになるんだ

translation.en: But it's nothing big, really.
translation.ja: でも大したことじゃない

translation.en: Sometimes I'll tease her a little bit. But it's just brotherly love, I think.
translation.ja: いじめることもあるけど やっぱり妹はかわいいよ
